text: Nancy Bernstein (1960 - September 18, 2015) was an American visual effects producer. She worked at Digital Domain and was later Head of Production at DreamWorks Animation. She produced the DreamWorks movie Rise of the Guardians (2012). Bernstein died on September 18, 2015 in Los Angeles, California, aged 55. She had colorectal cancer and was diagnosed in December 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1960 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American movie producers Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer
title: Nancy Bernstein
